title: Welcome to Collaborative Editor
content:
Welcome to the HTML File Editor!

This is a collaborative rich text editor built with:

  • Vue.js 3 + TypeScript

  • Tiptap editor framework

  • Socket.io for real-time collaboration

  • Node.js + Express backend

Features

  • Real-time collaboration - Multiple users can edit simultaneously

  • User presence - See who else is in the document

  • Live cursors - See where other users are typing

  • Version history - Track changes over time

  • Export options - HTML, Markdown, Plain Text

Welcome to the HTML File Editor!

  • User presence - See who else is in the document

  • Live cursors - See where other users are typing

  • Version history - Track changes over time

  • Export options - HTML, Markdown, Plain Text

Start editing this document to see real-time collaboration in action!Welcome to the HTML File Editor!
